thread.title: Amazing Boutique Hotel Close to The Roman Forum
thread.title_full: Amazing Boutique Hotel Close to The Roman Forum - Review of The Inn At The Roman Forum, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: akh1000
title: Amazing Boutique Hotel Close to The Roman Forum
text: Excellent Hotel! I would give it more than 5 stars. Great location on a quite street with Italian charm. Breakfast was amazing, Barbara is outstanding with her homemade breakfast entrees. All of the staff were very friendly & helpful. Twin room was very nice and comfortable. I am recommending this place to anyone traveling to Rome and am looking forward to a return visit someday! Rooftop terrace was lovely as well.
